text: Toto ye akholele obubii okhusaba likondi lilio okhumeta khukeke, netoto abeyisanga abanji bakholelanga obubii khubeene, halali balia basuubila mana nibakhola amalayi nenibatiti mubo. Mana Daudi nalola mbu khumukholeele amatemo, nasaba eshileshelo khu Nyasaye wuwe, mana nakwa hasi okhwihotselesia khu Nyasaye wuwe nende okhumukalushila
